text: The forecast is clear : It ’ s Sonny with a Chance of an adorable Disney Channel reunion. Five network stars — including Sonny actress Demi Lovato and The Suite Life of Zack & Cody ‘ s Cole Sprouse — got together Wednesday night at Los Angeles bar No Vacancy to celebrate the release of fellow Disney Channel alum Hayley Kiyoko ’ s ( Lemonade Mouth ) new album Expectations. Lovato and Sprouse posed for the shot next to Jessie ‘ s Debby Ryan, So Random! actor Matthew Scott Montgomery, and Sprouse ’ s Zack & Cody costar Alyson Stoner. “ Season finale of my life aka disney high reunion celebrating [ Hayley Kiyoko ], ” Montgomery captioned the photo while, per PEOPLE, Lo
